sentences: In the spin-off group, parties addressed natural disturbances, a cap on forest management and harvested wood products.
Parties exchanged views on force majeure and natural disturbances, including the commonalities and differences of both concepts.
Delegates eventually agreed to a revised text on force majeure now known as disturbances, with a few issues outstanding.
In the Chair s revised text (FCCC/KP/AWG/2011/CRP.1), delegates agreed to streamline text on, inter alia: reference levels; and rewetting and drainage.
Some parties supported a proposal on a cap for forest management when using reference levels, which remained bracketed.
Parties also addressed the proposal on flexible land use.
In the AWG-KP closing plenary, many parties welcomed progress on LULUCF.
